TFWindowContainer

class ui.tf_window_container.TFWindowContainer(parent)[source]

Bases: QWidget

A container widget managing multiple draggable windows within the application.

This class handles the creation, positioning, and state management of draggable windows. It provides functionality for window placement, state persistence, and window organization within the container area.

Parameters:

parent (QWidget) – Parent widget. Should be set as the main window.

Example

>>> # Creating a window container
>>> container = TFWindowContainer(parent_widget)
>>>
>>> # Adding a new calculator window
>>> container.add_window(TFCalculator)
>>>
>>> # Saving window states
>>> container.save_all_window_states()
Variables:

  • windows (List[TFDraggableWindow]) – List of managed draggable windows.

  • app (TFApplication) – Reference to the main application instance.

  • parent (QWidget) – Parent widget reference.

__init__(parent)[source]
save_all_window_states()[source]

Save the states of all current windows to the database.

Clears existing window states and saves the current state of all windows, including their positions and titles.

add_window(window_class: Type[TFDraggableWindow]) → None[source]

Add a new window of the specified class to the container.

Creates and positions a new window instance, ensuring it doesn’t exceed maximum count limits and doesn’t overlap with existing windows. Automatically connects necessary signals and handles window positioning.

Parameters:

window_class (Type[TFDraggableWindow]) – Class of the window to create.

resize_container() → None[source]

Resize the container to accommodate all windows.

Adjusts the container size based on the position and size of all contained windows, ensuring minimum dimensions are maintained. Uses MAX_WIDTH and MAX_HEIGHT as minimum constraints.

bring_window_to_front(window: TFDraggableWindow) → None[source]

Bring a specific window to the front of the stack.

Raises the specified window above other windows in the container.

Parameters:

window (TFDraggableWindow) – Window to bring to front.
